comments:
I20040505_1045

Refactoring creates global build actions to trigger buids manually if needed. 
Creating an instance of the action results in the following exception. It 
seems that this happens when we create the instance the second time, but not 
sure.

Fixed in build >20040505 (this was our submission to the rebuild).
*** Bug 61253 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
